entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Point Lepreau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:47 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Point Lepreau 07:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: 3.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 77 %
Dewpoint: 0.0°C
Wind: E 14 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Freezing rain mixed with rain. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain or freezing rain beginning early this morning then changing to freezing rain with rain this morning and then changing to ice pellets this afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to snow and ending late this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 10 except minus 5 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 10 except minus 5 along parts of the coast. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
